levelList.name: Flame Strike
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Gain 1 [MRcAiBa]

levelList.name: Ardor Blossom Pinions
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Gain 2 [MRcAiBa]

levelList.name: Spark
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Inflict +2 [Combustion] Count
[WinDuel] Inflict [Combustion] equal to [Combustion] on target
[DefeatDuel] Gain the following effects:
- Damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target
- If this is a Wrath Skill, remove [Combustion] on the target
- Halve the amount of [Combustion] and [Combustion] Count this Skill inflicts

coindescs.desc:
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] If target has 3+ [MRcAiBb]...
- Inflict 10 [Combustion]
- Inflict +2 [Combustion] Count
- Inflict 2 [MRcAiBc]
- [MRcAiBb] expires completely

levelList.name: Dust Explosion
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 5+ [Combustion], this Skill gains Clash Power +2

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Combustion] Count equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Against the enemy with the slowest Speed, inflict [Combustion] Count equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Combustion] equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Against the enemy with the lowest Speed, inflict [Combustion] equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn

levelList.name: Ardor Blossom Star
levelList.desc:
Gain Clash Power equal to (# of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn x2)
[WhenUse] Inflict (# of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn x2) [Combustion] to all enemies
[DefeatDuel] Gain the following effects:
- This Attack Skill deals 0 damage
- Remove [Combustion] from all targets
- Halve the amount of [Combustion] and [Combustion] Count this Skill inflicts

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Combustion] equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Against the enemy with the slowest Speed, Inflict [Combustion] and [Combustion] Count equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Combustion] equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Against the enemy with the slowest Speed, Inflict [Combustion] and [Combustion] Count equal to the number of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Raise the target's Stagger Threshold by 70% of damage dealt
- Inflict 10 [Combustion] against targets that have been Staggered by this

levelList.name: Evade
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 4 [Combustion] on target (max 3)
[WhenUse] Inflict 4 [Combustion]
[OnSucceedEvade] Gain 1 [MRcAiBa] next turn

levelList.name: Stoke the Flames

[CantDuel] [CantChangeTarget]
Damage dealt by this Attack Skill is fixed to 0

levelList.name: High-voltage Electric Discharge
levelList.desc:
At more than 7 [SelfCharge], deal +10% damage for every excess [SelfCharge] past 7 (max 120%)
[WhenUse] Lose all [SelfCharge] on self; if this unit lost 10+ [SelfCharge], gain Clash Power +5
[DefeatDuel] This Attack Skill deals 0 damage

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If target has [ElectricStorage], deal 40% of final damage dealt as fixed damage

levelList.name: Coil Up
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] The Head Part gains Shield by its current HP
[EndBattle] If the Head Part has Shield, gain 10 [SelfCharge] next turn

levelList.name: Wriggling Head
levelList.desc: Prioritizes targets with the least HP If target has [Paralysis], deal +50% damage If target has used a Defense Skill, deal -100% damage Base Power +1 for every [SelfCharge] [WhenUse] Lose 1 [SelfCharge] [EndSkill] If it was an Unopposed Attack, lose 1 [SelfCharge] - If the target attacked by this Skill used a Defense Skill, lose 1 more [SelfCharge]

levelList.name: Wriggling Tail
levelList.desc: Prioritizes targets with the least HP If target has [Paralysis], deal +50% damage If target has used a Defense Skill, deal -100% damage Base Power +1 for every [SelfCharge] [WhenUse] Lose 1 [SelfCharge] [EndSkill] If it was an Unopposed Attack, lose 1 [SelfCharge] - If the target attacked by this Skill used a Defense Skill, lose 1 more [SelfCharge]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Consume all [PhantomIncision] on target and deal ([PhantomIncision] consumed)% HP damage against each target, respectively

levelList.name: Phantom Step [殘像步]

levelList.name: Silent Regard
levelList.desc: [DefeatDuel] Gain 2 [Reduction] [DefeatDuel] Target heals 5 SP

levelList.name: Deathedge [絶命]
levelList.desc:
This Skill does not trigger the target's Defense Skill
Prioritizes the target with the least HP percentage
- Prioritizes targets that aren't Ryōshū

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [PhantomIncision] for every 1% missing HP on target
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume all [PhantomIncision] on target and deal ([PhantomIncision] consumed)% HP damage

levelList.name: Rend Space - String Connection [空間斬-緣]
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] At 10+ SP, generate 1 Mang. Final Power +5
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed; cannot be Staggered until this Skill ends
[DefeatDuel] Deal -80% damage and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target
[EndSkill] If this skill generated 1 Mang, lose 10 SP
[EndSkill] End this turn
levelList.flavor: A technique that cuts through space itself. Sundering the fabric of space has long been the ambition of those who live by the sword—a hard-won feat reached through divergent disciplines.

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Consume all [PhantomIncision] on target and deal ([PhantomIncision] consumed)% HP damage against each target, respectively

levelList.name: I-I Have to Execute the Prescript Soon...!

levelList.name: Please Don't Resist and just be Crushed to Death
